sentences.en: Cars are for getting people from A to B in maximum safety.
sentences.cn: 汽车用于将人们尽可能安全地从一地送往另一地。

sentences.en: Defrost the fridge regularly so that it works at maximum efficiency.
sentences.cn: 定期给冰箱除霜，以便它能发挥其最高效率。

sentences.en: Display the hologram under a strong light for maximum effect.
sentences.cn: 把立体全息图放在强光下展示以得到最佳效果。

sentences.en: Dry curly hair naturally for maximum curl and shine.
sentences.cn: 让卷发自然变干，才能使头发卷最多，最有光泽。

sentences.en: For maximum benefit, use your treatment every day.
sentences.cn: 为了达到最佳效果，你每天都要接受治疗。

sentences.en: It was Mann who structured the agenda for maximum efficiency.
sentences.cn: 是曼制定这个取得最大效率的议程的.

sentences.en: The award will consist of a lump sum to a maximum value of $5,000.
sentences.cn: 奖学金最高将是5,000美元，一次性给付。

sentences.en: The car has a maximum speed of 120 kilometres an hour.
sentences.cn: 这车全速每小时120公里.

sentences.en: The car has a maximum speed of 120 mph.
sentences.cn: 这辆汽车的最高时速为120英里。

sentences.en: The law provides for a maximum of two years in prison.
sentences.cn: 法律规定最高可处以两年监禁.

sentences.en: The maximum number of marks for the subject is 100.
sentences.cn: 该科最高分数为百分.

sentences.en: The offences carry a maximum sentence of 10 years.
sentences.cn: 这些罪行最高可判10年徒刑。

sentences.en: The plane can fly at a maximum altitude of 75,000 feet.
sentences.cn: 飞机最高飞行度为七万五千??.

sentences.en: The plant is operating at maximum capacity .
sentences.cn: 这家工厂正在开足马力生产。

sentences.en: The speed limit is 40 miles an hour. Don't exceed this maximum.
sentences.cn: 限速每小时四十英里, 不要超过这个极限.

sentences.en: They made maximum use of the resources available.
sentences.cn: 他们充分利用可获取的资源。

sentences.en: To get the maximum benefit, do the exercises slowly.
sentences.cn: 要想获得最佳的效果，这些运动要做得慢一点。

sentences.en: To minimize collateral damage maximum precision in bombing was required.
sentences.cn: 为了尽量减低附带性破坏，轰炸须做到最大程度的精确。

sentences.en: Twelve hours is the minimum, sixty hours the maximum.
sentences.cn: 12小时为下限,60小时为上限.

sentences.en: We might have a third child, but that’s the absolute maximum .
sentences.cn: 我们可能会要第三个孩子，但这绝对是极限了。

sentences.en: We might have a third child, but that’s the absolute maximum.
sentences.cn: 我们可能会要第三个孩子，但这绝对是极限了。

sentences.en: We need an extra 6g a day maximum.
sentences.cn: 我们一天最多还需要6克。

sentences.en: You have to develop your capabilities to the maximum.
sentences.cn: 你必须尽你所能。

words.tran_cn: 最高的，最大的；最全面的
使…最大化；取…最大值（maximize的ing形式）
尽可能广义地解释；达到最大值
把…增加到最大限度；尽量增大（等于maximize）

phrases.tran_cn: 最高生产能量；最大生产能力
最大似然估计；最大相似估计法
最大尺寸；容量上限；最大空间

trans.tran_en: the maximum amount, quantity, speed etc is the largest that is possible or allowed
the maximum amount, quantity, speed etc is the largest that is possible or allowed
the largest number or amount that is possible or is allowed
the largest number or amount that is possible or is allowed
the maximum amount, quantity, speed etc is the largest that is possible or allowed
